this the way to the princesses' apart- ments?" asked Anna Mikhaylovna of one of them. 
"Yes, "replied a footman in a bold loud voice, as if anything were now permissible; "the door to the left, ma'am." 
"Perhaps the count did not ask for me," said Pierre when he reached the landing. "I'd bet- ter go to my own room." 
Anna Mikhaylovna paused and waited for him to come up.
